title: Teen accused of 60km police chase in NSW
content: A teenager will face court after a 60km police chase through the NSW Riverina.   Police spotted a vehicle which looked similar to one that was reported stolen and tried to pull the driver over in Wagga Wagga on Saturday night around 8pm, NSW Police said in a statement on Sunday   The 17-year-old boy allegedly sped off and a pursuit continued for nearly 60km on the Stuart Highway through Collingullie and Galore before the driver stopped.   Police believe the vehicle was stolen.   The teenager was charged with a string of driving offences and was refused bail and will appear at a Children's Court on Sunday.
